title: २००९ को गाज़ा में हुए हमले की तस्वीर को कश्मीर की वर्तमान स्थिति का बताकर फैलाया जा रहा है
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: इस तस्वीर के साथ लिखा है कि, “Samera Baalusha(34) carries her surviving child Mohamad (15 months) while she waits to see the body of her daughter Jawaher Baalusha (aged 4) during the funeral held for her and four of her sisters who were killed in an Israeli missile strike, on December 29, 2008 in the Jebaliya refugee camp, in the northern Gaza Strip. Jawher Baalusha and four of her sisters were killed during an Israeli air raid while they were sleeping together in their bedroom.”
